text: Val Staples is an American illustrator, best known as the artist of the 2002 Masters of the Universe comic and founder of the comic studio MVCreations who published the comic. Val Staples worked for a variety of comic publishers including DC, Marvel and others. Val Staples of also the founder of the Masters of the Universe fansite He-man.org ==References== ==External links== *He-man.org Category:American comics artists Category:American comics writers Category:Comics colorists Category:American Internet company founders Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Val Staples
